citations.narrative:
The facility sold four coati at an exotic auction in Tennessee without a valid USDA AWA license. The consignor settlement
that dates 9/6/2024 shows that the four coati were sold by this unlicensed dealer to Wilson Horses and Mules Auction. A
valid license is necessary to protect the health and well-being of the animals and to comply with the Animal Welfare Act
and Regulations. No person shall operate as a dealer, exhibitor, or operator of an auction sale, without a valid license.
The facility needs to obtain a USDA license if continuing to sell or exhibit exotic/wild animal species.
Correct by applying for a license by 03/14/2025. No regulated activities may be conducted until a USDA license is
obtained.
This inspection and exit interview were not able to be conducted with facility representative due to no response.
n

narrative:
2.1(a)(1) 
   
Requirements and application. 
The facility sold four coati at an exotic auction in Tennessee without a valid USDA AWA license. The consignor settlement 
that dates 9/6/2024 shows that the four coati were sold by this unlicensed dealer to Wilson Horses and Mules Auction. A 
valid license is necessary to protect the health and well-being of the animals and to comply with the Animal Welfare Act 
and Regulations. No person shall operate as a dealer, exhibitor, or operator of an auction sale, without a valid license. 
The facility needs to obtain a USDA license if continuing to sell or exhibit exotic/wild animal species. 
 
Correct by applying for a license by 03/14/2025. No regulated activities may be conducted until a USDA license is 
obtained. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were not able to be conducted with facility representative due to no response. 
 
 n
